column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////It took us a few months to get our reservations
column2: however it was worth the wait.  I was very impressed with the location/ decor
column3: definitely a unique experience.  The steak was on par with comparable options.  I'd suggest the goat cheese appetizer and iceberg salad
column4: both were excellent.  Service was above average and very friendly.
